entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:12 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -42.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -46.8°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 42.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
